name: Shinobi Blocks
description:
Use A/D or Left/Right to run, space to jump

You can jump off of walls and double jump

Wall jumping on a falling block will move it away from you

Jumping from on top of a block will send it plummeting to the bottom

Fill in a row with blocks and they will disappear

How many rows can you complete?

This is my entry for Alakajam 4: Falling

'art' and programming by me

Font is Karma Future from https://www.1001freefonts.com/karmafuture.font
